quote: The sign above the door was written in French. It read: ARRÊTE ! C’EST ICI L’EMPIRE DE LA MORT.“That means,” he explained to Gini, “‘Stop! It is here the Empire of Death.
quote_letters: THE SIGN ABOVE THE DOOR WAS WRITTEN IN FRENCH IT READ ARRETE  CEST ICI LEMPIRE DE LA MORTTHAT MEANS HE EXPLAINED TO GINI STOP IT IS HERE THE EMPIRE OF DEATH
